# Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** Truck Up-Fit - Dump Box and Plow Mounting
**Reference Number:** PW-23-01030441 (Amendment: 2)
**Solicitation Number:** M5000-22-5362/A
**Publication Date:** 2023-03-20
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-27T16:00:00

**Description:**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites bids for the supply and installation of a dump box and plow mounting kit on a government-owned 2022 Ford F350 V8 gas truck. The Contractor is required to arrange for the pickup of the truck and plow operating parts from the RCMP Depot in Regina, Saskatchewan, and return the truck after installation.

**Deliverables:**
The Contractor must meet the following deliverables:

* Installation of a dump box
* Supply and installation of a plow mounting kit
* Return the truck in the same condition as received with the plow installed

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The bid will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Compliance with the bid solicitation
* Meeting all mandatory technical evaluation criteria

**Instructions for Submissions:**
Bidders must submit their proposals electronically to NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca by the closing date. The bid solicitation and related documents are available for download on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.

**Important Notes:**

* Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* Indigenous Procurement: The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for all levels of government and the private sector to identify Indigenous business capacity.

**Contact Information:**
For further information, please contact Jose Maldonado, Procurement Agent, at 10065 Jasper Ave, Edmonton, AB, T5J 3B1, or by email at jose.maldonado@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. You can also contact him at 780-670-8693. Please note that all communications must be in one of the official languages of Canada.
